data.name: Halloween run adventure for Run, chicken, run!
data.detailed_description:
Halloween run adventure for Run, chicken, run! - this is an additional content, with the new design for the endless game for the whole family. If you are bored with the chicken run, you can run as a Tom!

Imagine a Halloween day in the forest. Tom and his friends decided to celebrate this Halloween in the forest, because they thought that it will be so exciting to have a party in the dark and scary place, but they forgot that in this forest lives one very old and very angry witch. And tonight she caught kids and placed them in cages. Kids are feeling lonely, scared and very sad. But a brave kid, his name is Tom, has decided to to make everything possible save his friends.

Help Tom in his quest to rescue all kids in the forest. Run away from the witch as fast as you can, break the cages, free kids and collect stars. But you must be very careful, beware of stones and rockets, jump over the water, if you will fall in the water you will die. Yes, this is a forest and there are a lot of different dangerous obstacles, but don't forget that Tom is very brave and he must win.

Halloween run adventure will not let you be bored. Tom can run, accelerate and fly with parachute, if this is necessary, but he is just a small kid and sometimes he becomes tired. If Tom will get tired he may ask his friends: bull and gorilla, to give him a ride. All animals love Tom and are always ready to help. Run forward, collect stars and change them to another main heroes or to rockets, new rides on bull or gorilla, to the acceleration and many other cool features. You can dress the Tom to give him a special style. Download this DLC and find out what else it can offer you. I am sure you will not regret.

Features:
Nice colorful design
Funny personages and music
Easy control
Universal adventure for all ages

Halloween run adventure is a fun adventure that the whole family will enjoy!

The content of this DLC will be available from the game main menu.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 1.2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

package_groups.title: Buy Halloween run adventure for Run, chicken, run!

subs.option_text: Halloween run adventure for Run, chicken, run! - 1,99€
